The Knack Of.name: A Great Start
The Knack Of.description: Teaching you the basics about GXCQuest!

0: This is how to play GameXRogue by the Quests.
First, instructions for the use of your mouse.
Please press the yellow arrow at the bottom right.
1: No, not this, press the arrow.
2: This menu shows all the information regarding the characters.
You can check other menu by the red arrow.
Now let’s get out of this room!

4: You will need some basic weapons for the journey.
Open the inventory and equip the weapons.
5: You will find the weapon in the inventory.
Select the weapon and equip it.
6: Now with your weapon let’s get started!
Don’t forget the quest where you can earn the tokens.

0: I will give you 200 gold if you can find it for me.
It’s about the size of my body.
And it is made of leather.
2: Oh no, that is the wrong armor. But I will take it anyway.
I meant to say chain armor. Sorry.
Please find armor made of chain.
3: I will wait for my chain armor.

TheLie.name: The Lie
TheLie.description: Keep going, and do not ever look back.

0: Ah, so you would like to know how it all began..
Perhaps it is a story that is best left untold.
I'll spare you the details for the most part.
But one must understand the very core of his pain.
1: It mustn't make much sense at this point.
It's alright though. I ask this of you.

TooSpooky.name: Too Spooky
TooSpooky.description: Help the pirate girl recover her lost pendant.
